data_table.description: Neurologic Family History Form, Visit 5. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Neurologic Family History Form, NFH]

variable.name: NFH1
variable.description: Q1. Parents had memory loss that interfered with daily functioning [Neurologic Family History Form, NFH]

variable.name: NFH1A1
variable.description: Q1a1. Mother had memory loss [Neurologic Family History Form, NFH]

variable.name: NFH1A2
variable.description: Q1a2. Age mother memory loss symptoms began [Neurologic Family History Form, NFH]

variable.name: NFH1B1
variable.description: Q1b1. Father had memory loss [Neurologic Family History Form, NFH]

variable.name: NFH1B2
variable.description: Q1b2. Age father memory loss symptoms began [Neurologic Family History Form, NFH]

variable.name: NFH2
variable.description: Q2. Parents had dementia, Alzheimer disease, senility, artery hardening in brain [Neurologic Family History Form, NFH]
